about_the_game:
In Kazu Aether Origins, the player follows the journey of Kazu, the Finnish Spitz, in a hack/slash adventure on the Isles of Isvenness.

Dynamic, Fast-paced Hack/Slash Combat

The journey begins with Kazu, the Finnish Spitz, as he navigates through the Isles of Isvenness unraveling the mysteries of the world. While traversing the region, you will encounter many combat challenges and satirical elements.

Explore a World of Handcrafted Parallax Art

The biomes of Isvenness are intricately drawn based on the over-arching themes of the respective regions. While traversing the regions, you will encounter uniquely designed environmental and building art.

Master Aetheric Boons to Overcome Enemy Groups

An Aetheric Cataclysm has thrown the inhabitants into disarray. The world is now brimming with unstable Aether which has enhanced creatures with uncontrollable powers and a loss of self control. Kazu has an innate ability to absorb expelled Aether which enables him to utilize the powers for short periods of time.

Vanquish Aether Bosses and the Sources of Corruption

You will be challenged in varying degrees of boss designs employing reactionary timing and mastery of combat mechanics. On the Isles of Isvenness, the Aethers correspond to sins of corruption.

Immersive, Dynamic Transitions and Open World World Design

The world is designed with open-exploration providing a non-linear gameplay experience. Progress through the region at your own pace as you search for the sources of corruption.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10-64 bit
  • Processor: CPU - Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU - NVIDIA Geforce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11600K | AMD Ryzen 5 5600X or Higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 | Radeon RX 5500 XT or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Kazu Aether Origins is a hack-slash action adventure on the Isles of Isvenness. Overcome combat challenges, journey the lands, and interact with satirical elements for a light-hearted, action-packed gameplay experience.
